sourcesContent:
import { View, Text, Button } from "react-native"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import { signUp } from "state/firebaseFunctions"; const Signup = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(); const [password, setPassword] = useState(); const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const attemptSignUp = () => { if (email && password) { signUp(email, password); } }; return (

setEmail(event.target.value)} value={email} />
setPassword(event.target.value)} value={password} />
); }; export default Signup;
